DIA_HolidayCitizen_NS71_Start_03_01: Do you hear that noise? It's crazy!
DIA_HolidayCitizen_NS71_Start_03_02: I came to Silbach to rest, but when I found a comfortable place for myself there was this lunatic playing the horn!
DIA_HolidayCitizen_NS71_End_03_03: Interesting thing... That annoying horn sound just went away...
DIA_HolidayCitizen_NS71_End_03_04: I don't know why, but I feel like you did it.
DIA_HolidayCitizen_NS71_End_03_05: Take some gold...now I'll finally get some rest.
